## SxThemeProp type

This prop allows for deeper nesting of styles within media queries and tags.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SxThemeProp = SystemStyleObject & Record<string, SystemStyleObject | ResponsiveStyleValue<number | string> | Record<string, SystemStyleObject | ResponsiveStyleValue<number | string> | undefined | null> | undefined | null>;
```
